news.image_caption: Take a look at the Artheon VR Museum!
news.content:
The Artheon Virtual Reality Museum allows visitors to explore and interact with hundreds of thousands of pieces of fine art, with or without a VR headset!

Take a tour here.

Artheon will soon be hosted on top of the ThreeFold Grid, serviced by Green Edge.

For early access and information, please join the Artheon Telegram group here.
news.excerpt: Here's a look at an incredible project happening in the ThreeFold universe!

previous.title: Why ThreeFold chose Stellar
previous.excerpt: At ThreeFold, together with a beautiful ecosystem of partners, we are co-creating a peer-to-peer Internet that empowers equality, freedom, and sustainability.

next.title: TomoChain & ThreeFold are joining forces to decentralize Cloud Computing
next.excerpt: TomoChain will invite their developer community and anyone interested in contributing to the TomoChain Blockchain, to connect and use the Threefold Grid.
